Nahetu
Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka
Kusalattika, Sappaṭighaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccanīya
Nahetu
21.
1150Akusalaṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1)
1151Abyākataṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
22.
1152Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava…pe…  novigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1153(Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
